title: The MHS Triad: Three Leaders Reshaping Military Medicine

title: The $90B Squeeze: DHP Meets Rural Health Transformation

description: One year after full deployment—what's working, what's broken, and where the follow-on opportunities are hiding.

description: Emil Michael's AI adoption push is real. Here's the timeline, the contract vehicles, and how to get in the door.
